title: Trump's pick to lead State Dept. faces tough hearing
text:
Trump's pick to lead State Dept. faces tough hearing 11:11am BST - 01:58 
U.S. President Donald Trump’s nominee for secretary of state, Mike Pompeo, will face tough questions on North Korea and Iran if he is to be confirmed after a hearing with the U.S. Senate Foreign Relations Committee on Thursday.   
U.S. President Donald Trump’s nominee for secretary of state, Mike Pompeo, will face tough questions on North Korea and Iran if he is to be confirmed after a hearing with the U.S. Senate Foreign Relations Committee on Thursday.  //reut.rs/2qsaFqy
